about_the_game: In this sequel to DPS Idle released in 2014, you will embark on an epic fantasy adventure in this idle/incremental hack-and-slash game! Cut through endless enemies, collect powerful loot, and level up your hero to face ever-greater challenges. With endless progression, dynamic combat, and artifact crafting, this game offers the perfect blend of action, strategy, and reward. Whether you're grinding for rare drops or letting the game work while you're away, the path to ultimate power is yours to forge!

short_description: Dive into a fantasy idle/incremental game where hack-and-slash combat meets endless progression! Defeat enemies, collect epic loot, and level up to unlock new powers. Craft artifacts, conquer powerful bosses, and grow stronger! Forge your path to greatness in a world of endless adventure!
